PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-02562017-03-24,  HC,  ,  , 
ActTobacco Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Schedule to the Tobacco Act (Menthol)
PrecisOrder Amending the SCHEDULE TO THE TOBACCO ACT (MENTHOL) in order to support directly one of the four objectives of the Tobacco Act, namely “to protect young persons and others from inducements to use tobacco products and the consequent dependence on them”; and would be achieved by further reducing the attractiveness of tobacco products through limiting the availability of menthol flavoured tobacco products in Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0045 Publication Date: 2017-04-05
AttachmentsAttachment
